item.title: Parameterized Reporting in R
item.description: Just give me the code Skip all this and jump to the parameterized-reporting-example.Rmd file in my parameterized-reporting repo. About parametrized reports This is a parameterized report written in in R Markdown. It consists of a combination of text and code chunks and uses R, pandoc, and LaTeX to connect to a data source, create visualizations, and export a single file to html, pdf, or word without changing the code.
